title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 70 - Medical Malpractice Insurance Rate Modifications, Provisional Rates, Required Policy Provisions And Availability Of Additional Coverages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 70 - Medical Malpractice Insurance Rate Modifications, Provisional Rates, Required Policy Provisions And Availability Of Additional Coverages

State Regulations
§ 70.0 - Preamble
§ 70.1 - Definitions
§ 70.2 - No-consent policies
§ 70.3 - Consent policies
§ 70.4 - Rating
§ 70.5 - Reduction of 1984-1985 physicians medical malpractice insurance rate levels, pursuant to 1985 medical malpractice reform act (chapter 294)
§ 70.6 - Provisional rates for the period commencing july 1, 1985 and ending on november 30, 1985: required endorsement
§ 70.7 - Availability of coverages for excess of primary levels of insurance; rates for such excess coverages; requirements for medical malpractice insurers
§ 70.8 - Physicians medical malpractice liability insurance rates for claims-made and occurrence primary and excess policies and claims-made tail coverage
§ 70.9 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice insurance policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1988: required endorsement; established rates
§ 70.10 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice insurance policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1989; established rates
§ 70.11 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1990; established rates
§ 70.12 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1991; established rates
§ 70.13 - Occurrence policies for physicians
§ 70.14 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1992; established rates
§ 70.15 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1993; established rates
§ 70.16 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1994; established rates
§ 70.17 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1995; established rates
§ 70.18 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1996; established rates
§ 70.19 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1997; established rates
§ 70.20 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1998; established rates
§ 70.21 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 1999; established rates
§ 70.22 - Physicians and surgeons medical malpractice policy provisions for the period commencing July 1, 2000; established rates

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 70

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 1103, 1113, 3426, 3436, 5502, 5504, 5907, 6302, 6303, art. 23; L. 1986, ch. 266; L. 1987, ch. 208; L. 1988, chs. 184, 186; L. 1981, chs. 165, 381; L. 1992, ch. 27; L. 1993, ch. 256; L. 1994, ch. 223; L. 1995, ch. 81; L. 1996, chs. 253, 639; L. 1997, chs. 161, 261; L. 1998, ch. 148; L. 1999, ch. 407, Part JJ; L. 2000, ch. 147

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
